case.title: The Live TV player should be available by clicking the "Live TV" link in the website header
The vibrant color gradient in the background should be displayed by random hovering
The Close icon should be displayed by random hovering
The Progress bar should be displayed by random hovering

The user should be able to pause the video by clicking on the player area

The user should be able to close the stream by clicking on the Close icon
The user should be able to switch the display mode of content on the screen by clicking the Fullscreen icon

The user should be able to open the program by clicking [Programm]
The EPG should be updated as soon as a show ends
The title should be updated as soon as a show ends

1 The autoplay notification in the VOD should contain a [Ausblenden] button
The following episode playback should start after the current episode finishes
The standard VOD UI should not be displayed in VOD while notification is on the screen
The user should be able to hide the autoplay notification in the VOD by taping the [Ausblenden] button in the notification
The user should be able to forward to the following episode by taping the [Jetzt abspielen] button in the autoplay notification in the VOD

User is able to log in by entering the previously registered data on the login page after clicking on the logo in the upper right corner.
User is able to be redirected to the login page by clicking on the logo.
User is able to be redirected to the login page by entering https://interaction.7pass.de/ in the search bar of the web browser.
User is able to log in by entering a valid email in "E-mail-Adresse" on the first login page.
First "Sign in" page should contain "Joyn" logo.
First "Sign in" page should contain "Willkommen bei Joyn" headline.
First "Sign in" page should contain “Möchtest du dich registrieren oder einloggen? Gib einfach deine E-Mail-Adresse ein.” message.
First "Sign in" page should contain the “Email” field.
The "Email" field should contain an "E-mail-Adresse” placeholder on the first "Sign in" page.
First "Sign in" page should contain “oder” line.
First "Sign in" page should contain [Facebook] button.
First "Sign in" page should contain [Google] button.
First "Sign in" page should contain [Apple] button.
First "Sign in" page should contain [Telegram] button.
First "Sign in" page should contain [Amazon] button.
First "Sign in" page should contain [Anmelden] button.
User is able to be redirected on the next page by clicking [Anmelden] button.
Second "Sign in" page should contain "Joyn" logo.
Second "Sign in" page should contain "Willkommen zurück" headline.
Second "Sign in" page should contain "Gib einfach dein Passwort ein und es geht direkt weiter." message.
Second "Sign in" page should contain already filled the email field.
Second "Sign in" page should contain "Nicht du?" link.
Second "Sign in" page should contain "Passwort" field.
"Passwort" field should contain "Eye" icon to show password on the second "Sign in" page.
Second "Sign in" page should contain "Passwort vergessen?" link.
Second "Sign in" page should contain [Anmelden] button.
"Info" message should displayed under the Email field when user enters password.
"Anmelden" button should displayed under the Email field when user enters password.
User is able to be redirected on the next page by clicking [Anmelden] button.
Third "Sign in" page should contain "Du bist jetzt mit deiner useremail. Viel Spaß!" message.
Third "Sign in" page should contain [Weiter] button.
User is able to be redirect on the login page by clicking on the [Weiter] button.
User is able to receive an invite message for registration when entered non-existing email.
User is able to be redirect on the registration page by clicking "Noch kein Profil?..." link.
The "Email" field should be able to accept "@" special characters.
The "Email" field should be able to accept "." special characters.
The "Passwort" field should be able to accept minimum 6 char.
The "Passwort" field should be able to accept maximum 60 char.
The user should be redirected to the Login page by clicking on the bookmark icon
The bookmark icon should be filled after the user log in if the user redirects to the Login page by clicking on the bookmark icon and login
The "Originals & Exclusives" future lane should not be available to log-out users
The VOD player should not be available for logout users
The logout user should be able redirected to Login page when trying to open VOD player
The Live TV player should not be available for logout users
The logout user should be able redirected to Login page when trying to open Live player
